phrs.translation: 诅咒的, 咀咒的, 唱片名

sentences.sentence: He answered, "Yes Sir, but the Goddamned wire has to be fixed".
sentences.translation: 他回答，“对，长官，但这该死的电线不修不行”。

sentences.sentence: It turned out to be such a goddamned disaster from his point of view.
sentences.translation: 从他的角度来看，这变成了一件非常倒霉的事情。
